2015-SDD-HSC.question:
A team has been contracted to create a software package.

Which of the following is the teamâ€™s most appropriate first step?
options: Use a Gantt chart to plan the development
Look for useful modules in a software library
Interview the client for the system requirements
Create a prototype to show different interface styles

2015-SDD-HSC.question: Which of the following is represented in a data flow diagram?
options: The order in which processes occur
Where data originates and where it is stored
The sequence of tasks involved in completing a project
The decisions that are made when sub-modules are called

2015-SDD-HSC.question: It is legal to copy software and sell the copies if
options: copyright is acknowledged.
the software is open source.
the software has been paid for.
the licence specifies that this is allowed.

2015-SDD-HSC.question:
Some of the variables in a program are to be given new names.

Which documentation must also be modified?
options: Storyboard
Data dictionary
System flowchart
Requirements definition

2015-SDD-HSC.question: How can the inclusivity of a computer program be enhanced?
options: By replacing password characters with asterisks
By providing a range of methods for inputting data
By providing all the necessary library routines in a single DLL
By ensuring that all sources have been included in the acknowledgements
